video.title: Weird or What?
video.synopsis: From medical oddities to abnormal natural disasters to puzzling disappearances, this investigative series delves into all manner of mysteries.

episodes.synopsis: Farmers find livestock mutilated by unknown forces; a man is repeatedly abducted; and an astronomer intercepts a message from space.
episodes.title: Alien Encounters

episodes.synopsis: A man believes he is the reincarnation of a Civil War general; scientists conduct groundbreaking séances; and a man returns from the grave.
episodes.title: Life After Death

episodes.synopsis: A winged demon terrorizes a town; a man finds the remains of an unknown sea creature; and thousands report being attacked by a "monkey man."
episodes.title: Monsters

episodes.synopsis: Mayan texts foretell volcanic cataclysm; an astronomer expects dire consequences from solar flares; and a renowned engineer predicts a robot takeover.
episodes.title: End of the World

episodes.synopsis: A hiker encounters a strange entity; a machine transports a boy and his dad away in a second; and ancient carvings are believed to be cosmic gateways.
episodes.title: Parallel Worlds

episodes.synopsis: A town is devastated by an earth-shattering boom; a paranormal fog haunts Lake Michigan; and lights over the Indian Ocean send a nation into panic.
episodes.title: Freaks of Nature

episodes.synopsis: An invisible attacker terrorizes a woman in her home; a mother undergoes an exorcism; and a teen is terrified when a ghost visits her.
episodes.title: Paranormal Mysteries

episodes.synopsis: A woman survives a failed skydive; a man's charred remains smolder in an otherwise undamaged room; and a girl is able to harness electrical power.
episodes.title: Medical Mysteries

episodes.synopsis: A woman's sudden vision helps crack a homicide case; a man remembers every moment of his life; and a faith healer miraculously cures a woman in pain.
episodes.title: Power of the Mind

episodes.synopsis: An odd skull suggests aliens once walked the planet; ancient carvings could rewrite evolution; and ancient Egyptians may have invented modern flight.
episodes.title: Ancient Mysteries

episodes.synopsis: See incredible stories of people cheating death, such as a man who walked away from the 9/11 World Trade Center tragedy unscathed, and more.
episodes.title: Amazing Survival

episodes.synopsis: A woman and her son think they've seen the Jersey Devil; a Southern town is plagued by a giant reptile; and a werewolf-like creature stalks Wisconsin.
episodes.title: Man Beasts

episodes.synopsis: A rancher slays a mysterious creature; a woman claims her father is an alien; and a young serviceman befriends a colony of extraterrestrials.
episodes.title: Aliens Walk Among Us

episodes.synopsis: Explore some blood-chilling curses, including a string of fires linked to a mysterious painting, and a doll that's believed to carry a voodoo spirit.
episodes.title: Curses

episodes.synopsis: A psychic octopus predicts several World Cup winners; a Scottish bridge is a magnet for dog suicides; and a cat crosses the country to find its owner.
episodes.title: Weird Animal Behaviour

episodes.synopsis: Can science explain seemingly haunted objects, such as a plane occupied by ghosts, or a mysterious portrait that is blamed for a vicious attack?
episodes.title: Ghosts in the Machine

episodes.synopsis: A man warns of a horrific plane crash before it happens; a boy saves his family from a volcano; and a man predicts disasters with uncanny accuracy.
episodes.title: Premonitions

episodes.synopsis: Three men vanish from a yacht; a dozen people disappear from a mountaintop; and a young pilot slips away into thin air.
episodes.title: Mysterious Vanishings

episodes.synopsis: A mysteriously ill patient stumps dozens of medics; lightning turns a man into a musical genius; and a man cries tears of blood.
episodes.title: Medical Mysteries

episodes.synopsis: A man believes aliens are monitoring him; a spirit helps a housewife write books; and a woman suspects she's the target of a government experiment.
episodes.title: Mind Control
